price: 49. Mpe tokelaki biloko nyoso mibale mibale, mpo bokoka kokanisa.
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
